item.title: Streamlined Nextcloud With OpenID Connect Authentication
item.description:
This article explains how to set up a fast and efficient Nextcloud as file management tool with OpenID Connect to Authelia.

It is part of my series on creating a home server on an old laptop. I’m assuming that you’ve set up Docker, Caddy, and Authelia, as described in the first article of the series.
